content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron mine at position(15.5, 70.5)
Consists of electric mining drill (position 15.5, 70.5) and furnace (position 16.0, 73.0)

### Electricity generator at position(-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position -9.5, -0.5), boiler (position -8.0, -0.5), and steam engine (position -4.5, -0.5)

### Electricity generator at position(-9.5, 1.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position -9.5, 1.5)

### Logistic Science Pack Factory at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of assembling machine (position 0.5, 0.5)

### Copper mine at position(-46.5, 70.5)
Consists of electric mining drill (position -46.5, 70.5), inserter (position -46.5, 72.5), and wooden chest (position -46.5, 73.5)

## ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using undefined attributes
- Ensure that the attribute or variable is correctly defined before using it. 
- In this case, 'Prototype' has no attribute 'LogisticSciencePack'. The correct attribute name is 'LogisticsSciencePack'.

### Errors when using undefined variables
- Ensure that variables are defined before they are used. 
- In this case, 'drill' and 'entity' are not defined when trying to access or use them.

### Errors when connecting entities with pipes
- Ensure that the source and target entities are adjacent and that there are no obstacles blocking the connection.
- In this case, there was an error connecting offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5) to boiler at (-8.0, -0.5).

### Errors when placing entities next to other entities
- Ensure that the target position is not occupied by another entity or water.
- Consider increasing the spacing, changing the direction, or changing the reference position.
- In this case, there were errors placing boiler next to offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5) and (-9.5, 1.5).

### Errors when placing entities at a specific position
- Ensure that the target position is not occupied by another entity.
- In this case, there was an error placing boiler at (-9.0, 0.0) and wooden chest at (-46.5, 73.5) because the target position is too far away.

### Errors when crafting items without required ingredients
- Ensure that the required ingredients are available in the inventory before crafting.
- In this case, there was an error crafting 'automation-science-pack' because 'copper-plate' was not available.

### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure that the item to be inserted is available in the inventory and that the entity has available space.
- In this case, there were errors inserting 'automation-science-pack', 'copper-ore', and 'coal' into entities because they were not available in the inventory or the entity had no available space.

## NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
